TopicTitle: New Thread or just keep the old one?

Articles.Content: I have recently taken on the task of keeping the Hooligan Labs mods up to date and I am wondering if I should just start a new thread for it like Majiir did for KAS or if I should keep the old thread going. Advantage to starting a new one is that I could actually alter the title and first post for updates.
The new KAS thread was made on KospYs request. Unless you have fully taken over the mod Id consult with hooligan...If the mods yours now then you should make a new thread.
